whydps.heading: Why Divine Public School
whydps.subHeading: What makes us best suitable for your wards
paraList: Divine Public School ensures acedemic excellence, character building and leadership skills which help allround development of a student. Easily accessible location for families to come the well trained and professional staffs.
Now a Days School has become the first stepping stone in the life of a child. where S/he learns a lot more than just rate learning. It is the best place where student can acquire education

Divine public School is the best school in this area. School teachers teachs students how to face the real life problems. This School have the best infraastructure and state of the art facilities, including well library rooms, labs  for workshps and open space for sports. This school is an innovative efferts to integrate the best ideas in education

admprocedure.heading: Admission Procedure
paraList: Our school encourages students participating in extracurricular activities and it is a great way to widen and broaden students’ social circle, expand their interests, and build leadership skills. Our school promotes students’ involvement in school extracurricular activities which leads to positive long-term outcomes.
